mapper.update: update feature_info set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, smoke = #{smoke,jdbcType=INTEGER}, scenarios_num = #{scenariosNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, project_id, smoke, scenarios_num, status, operator, create_time, update_time from feature_info where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, name, project_id, smoke, scenarios_num, status, operator, create_time, update_time from feature_info
